templateOptions.label: Start date of the research activity

fieldGroup.template:
Fill in this item according to the committee to which your report is addressed:

  • For the #nombre_comite_M10_en# start date of recruitment.
  • For the #nombre_comite_M20_en# start date of use of experimental animals.
  • For the #nombre_comite_M30_en# start date of handling of biological agents or GMOs, hazardous chemicals, radioactive substances.
